definition: rose-tinted sky or clouds at sunrise or sunset
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

sentences.english: According to its spatial distribution patterns and regional differences, three major Danxia landform concentrated areas in China are identified in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 主要研究了三大丹霞地貌集中分布区的景观异质性。

sentences.english: The Xinjiang Basin is one of the typical areas in China where develop typical Danxia landforms.
sentences.chinese: 信江盆地是我国丹霞地貌发育最典型的区域之一。

sentences.english: Langshan landscape area is a new discovered famous scenic area in Hunan Province.
sentences.chinese: 崀山风景区的造景地貌是丹霞地貌。

sentences.english: Danxia landform is a kind of particular landform scenery.
sentences.chinese: 丹霞地貌是一种独特的地貌景观资源。

definition: karst landform (weathered limestone, often forming caves)
rhyolite (extrusive igneous rock, chemically equivalent to granite)
Mt Danxia in Shaoguan 韶關|韶关[Shao2 guan1], Guangdong/Danxia landform (red conglomerate and sandstone)
Mt Danxia in Shaoguan 韶關|韶关[Shao2 guan1], Guangdong
Stone Forest, notable set of limestone formations in Yunnan
